name: Hotel Detective
overview: In this game you play the role of a detective who is hunting murderers in a hotel. The gameplay involves you moving down the corridor and waiting for the doors to open to see if the killer is hiding in there. The mouse is used to control the crosshairs and holding down the right mouse button combined with moving the mouse left or right will move you along the corridor. There is a symbol at the bottom right of the screen which roughly guides you to where the killer is hiding but you have to be sure it’s the killer as if you shoot an innocent hotel guest you will lose a life. Time is also ticking away so you have to be quick in finding the killer.
